title: Official PHP Documentation
description: The official PHP documentation provides comprehensive information about PHP functions, classes, and development tips, suitable for all skill levels.

title: PHP Tutorial
description: This modern PHP tutorial helps you learn how to develop dynamic websites and web applications using PHP from scratch.

title: PHP Tutorial - W3Schools
description: This W3Schools tutorial offers a beginner-friendly introduction to PHP, covering basics, methods, and numerous examples with a try-it-yourself editor.

title: PHP Tutorial - Tutorialspoint
description: Tutorialspoint presents a series of comprehensive lessons on PHP, ranging from simple to complex topics including database integration.

title: PHP Tutorial - GeeksforGeeks
description: GeeksforGeeks provides a detailed tutorial on PHP, focusing on fundamentals, data handling, and advanced programming techniques.

title: PHP Tutorial - JavaTpoint
description: JavaTpoint offers extensive PHP tutorials that include clear explanations and code examples covering the basics to advanced programming concepts.

title: PHP API Documentation - DevDocs.io
description: DevDocs offers a fast, searchable interface to PHP documentation, combining all the PHP manual entries with search capabilities.

title: Learn PHP in Y Minutes
description: This guide from Learn X in Y Minutes provides a quick overview of PHP, suitable for programmers looking for a syntax refresher or a quick start.
